column5: immigration officials at Phnom Penh International Airport expelled 61 Chinese nationals for telecommunication fraud (VOIP). Two special aircraft were used in the operation. Flight MF 8810
column7: 5 of them women and Flight MU 7044 took 35 suspects
column8: including 1 woman.------The removals were done in cooperation with the Chinese Embassy in Cambodia and Chinese police
column9: who accompanied the suspects on the flight.------SOURCE
